H1.title: Mass forces to coerce quickly
H1.description: Local forces concentrate personnel and equipment in visible staging areas to create an immediate sense of threat and compress the opponentâ€™s decision time. The buildup is designed to extract concessions without necessarily initiating full-scale combat. aaaaa

H2.title: Maneuver to set conditions
H2.description: Local forces reposition to establish routes, staging areas, and timing for a potential offensive. Indicators include corridor clearing, bridging/logistics activity, and movements toward key junctions or objectives.
